meanings.definition: A type of knot used to form a fixed loop at the end of a rope.
meanings.sent1: Sailors often use bowlines to secure ropes on ships.
meanings.sent2: I learned how to tie bowlines during my sailing class.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the bowlines, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship with him was like a well-tied bowline, strong and reliable.
meanings.sent5: The bowlines held the tent firmly in place during the storm.
